physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Marked flaccidity, cardiac insufficiency, respiratory insufficiency, bradycardia, marked axial hypotonia, no spontaneous movements or responsiveness, no alertness.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 1 died on day 2 of life. No progression of findings documented.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Generalized muscular hypotonia, respiratory insufficiency, enteropathy with voluminous diarrhea, necrolytic migratory erythema of the skin, ascites, renal failure, pulmonary edema.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 2 died in week 4 of life. No detailed changes documented over time.
